! all lengths and dimensions in cm
! scales are relative to default font height hei=0.3633 cm

graphWidth = 8.5
graphHeight = graphWidth/ratio

titleDist = 0.15
titleScale = 0.8
axisLabelDist = 0.1
axisLabelScale = 0.7
axisTitleDist = titleDist
axisTitleScale = 0.8

axisWidth = 0.03
lineWidth = 0.02
markerSize = 0.15

keyHei = 0.2
keyDist = 0.07
keyMargins = 0.12
keyLineLength = 0.3
keyColDist = 0.3
